title: Teachers and doctors in England offered 4 pay rise

title: UK net migration in 2024 almost halves to 431,000, ONS estimates

description: But the justice secretary says she rejects recommendations for earlier releases of the most serious offenders.

title: Women with dense breasts should have extra NHS cancer scans, researchers say
description: Additional scans better tailored to spotting cancer in dense breasts could treble detection rates.

title: What we know so far

title: UK signs deal to hand Chagos Islands to Mauritius

title: Ducketts 140 puts England in charge of Zimbabwe Test
